title: 820-3437 - Sensor issue Th1H issue
message:
Hi,

I have that board which was previously fixed in another store for liquid damage.
Repair was done around backlight circuitry and that one works.
SMC was also reflowed.

I know that sensor is on the I/O board so I've tried with a different I/O board and same issue.
I've tried a known good board in the case and everything works as expected.

I went ahead and did replaced the SMC but in the end, same issue.

I don't have the schematic for that I/O board and I am not asking for it... ;-)
However can someone tells me which line that sensor speaks to the SMC on so I can do a diode mode measurement and check for continuity from the connector the nearest point near SMC?

Thanks!

title: 820-3437 - Sensor issue Th1H issue
message:
Check pins 5, 11, 13 of J9500.
Don't forget to try known good LIO flex too.
